title: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class
description: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? The output is showing "MySomeClass", but I expect the output to be "MySomeAnn". This issue is not present in Servlet 3.0 specification. My code works fine on Glassfish 3.0.
OB: When executing the code, the output displays "MySomeClass".
EB: The expected output should be "MySomeAnn" instead of "MySomeClass".
